trigger_prototype.expression: {Template OS OpenBSD SNMP:carpIfState[{#SNMPINDEX}].last(180)} <> {Template OS OpenBSD SNMP:carpIfState[{#SNMPINDEX}].last(0)}
trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} CARP Transition on {$SNMPVALUE} to [{ITEM.VALUE}]

item_prototype.name: PF Blocked IPv4 Packets In on {#PFIFDESCR}
PF Passed IPv4 Packets In on {#PFIFDESCR}
PF Blocked IPv4 Packets Out on {#PFIFDESCR}
PF Passed IPv4 Packets Out on {#PFIFDESCR}

trigger_prototype.name: UPS Runtime - {#SENSORDEVICE} {#SENSORDESCR}
trigger_prototype.description: The runtime on the UPS has fallen below 2 minutes.

trigger_prototype.name: UPS Runtime - {#SENSORDEVICE} {#SENSORDESCR}
trigger_prototype.description: The runtime on the UPS has fallen below 5 minutes.
